text: Witness is a 1985 American Dutch romantic crime drama movie directed by Peter Weir and starring Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas, Jan Rube≈°, Josef Sommer, Danny Glover, Angus MacInnes, Viggo Mortensen, Robert Earl Jones. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for 8 Academy Awards and won 2 Oscars in 1986. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 crime drama movies Category:1985 romantic drama movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Dutch crime movies Category:Dutch romance movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Weir Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies set in Philadelphia Category:Movies composed by Maurice Jarre
title: Witness (1985 movie)
